name: LaserBirds Demo
description:
Try a demo of the first level in our new game LaserBirds! Coming out later this year! You can play this game with a normal keyboard and mouse but is also compatible with a standard controller. Collect all of the coins and shoot any other bird that blocks your path, if you kill the other birds you get five extra points! Try to get to the end without getting killed!

Keyboard Controls:

  • Move Left and Right: A and D or Left and Right keys
  • Jump: Space or W
  • Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Controller Controls:

  • Move Left and Right: Joystick
  • Jump: A button
  • Shoot: R Shoulder Button

**DEVELOPMENT BUILD NOT FINAL GAME, TITLE IN DEVELOPMENT, MORE FEATURES AND LEVELS ARE COMING**
